title: Kansas Principal Aquifers (USGS/KGS)
description: Principal aquifer extents for Kansas, including the High Plains/Ogallala, Equus Beds, Great Bend Prairie, and other local/alluvial aquifers. Suitable for overlay with groundwater levels and water-use histories.

endpoints.notes: USGS principal aquifers service + KGS aquifer pages for Kansas regional/local extents.

steps: Fetch USGS principal aquifers polygons (national), filter to Kansas bbox
Merge/augment with KGS regional/local aquifer boundaries (Equus Beds, Great Bend Prairie)
Standardize attributes: aquifer_name, system, type (confined/unconfined), source

lineage: Augmented with KGS regional/local aquifer extents
notes: Prefer KGS for local precision around Equus Beds and Great Bend Prairie. Add monitoring wells layer to enable time-series cross-filtering.
